excerpt.rendered:
DR 14,800,000,000.00
Brand New 2020 Ferrari 488 Pista Rosso Scuderia

PRICE : Rp 14,8 M off the road

Exterior : Rosso Scuderia
Interior : Alcantara Nero 9440
Mats : Extra-Range

Options :
Apple CarPlay
Adaptive Frontlight System
Central Part of Seats in Alcantara Rosso FX
Rosso Scuderia Brake Callipers
Carbon Fibre Front Flaps
Carbon Fibre Side Air Splitter
Engine Covers in Carbon Fibre
Rear Diffuser in Carbon Fibre
Front Air Vents in Carbon Fibre
Carbon Fibre Underdoor Cover
Carbon Fibre Floor Plates
Carbon Fibre Inner Sill Trim
Carbon Fibre Upper Centre Console Trim
Coloured Inner Details Rosso Ferrari 130421
Carbon Fibre Hub Caps
Suspension Lifter
Cavallino Stitched on Headrest Rosso 0504
Titanium Exhaust Pipes
Additional Coloured Mats with Logo
Carbon Fibre Rear Moulding
High Emotion Low Emission
‘Scuderia Ferrari’ Shields
Int/Ext Electrochromic Mirrors
Radionavi System + Bluetooth
Navtrak Anti-Theft System Sub
Racing Stripe Extra-Range
20″ Dark Forged Wheels
Carbon Fibre Racing Seats Large Size Seats
Racing Seat Lifter
Integrated Audio System
Special Equipment
Coloured Special Stitching O.R. Rosso 0504

Special Equipment :
Racing Livery in Metallic Oro Fym. 138364
